Asset Management Officer Job at Rosettee Construction




        
    

        
        Rosettee Construction is a construction company that has been incorporated for over three (3) Decades, offering productive and seamless services. We are professionals in Civil Engineering, Steel Structure, Electrical and Mechanical Engineering and we are a KIRBY authorized builder in Nigeria. We specialize in delivering to our clients Turn key Projects.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Asset Management Officer

Job Location: Lagos

Job Purpose (Summary)
     

            
    




	To ensure efficient management, tracking, and safeguarding of company assets through effective documentation, accurate reporting, and compliance with established policies.
	The Asset Management Officer maintains transparency and accountability in all asset-related operations to support financial integrity and operational efficiency.


Key Responsibilities


	Implement company policies and procedures to ensure objectivity, transparency, and integrity in asset management operations.
	Maintain accurate and timely data entry for all asset-related information within approved systems.
	Monitor, safeguard, and control company assets, ensuring adherence to established tracking and reporting policies.
	Keep all asset records, registers, and reports consistently updated and properly maintained.
	Generate and submit weekly and monthly asset management reports in line with reporting timelines.
	Coordinate asset documentation, tagging, and movement tracking to prevent discrepancies, theft, or losses.
	Operate primarily from the head office, while conducting periodic site visits for physical verification and audit of assets.
	Support the finance and administration teams in asset valuation, reconciliation, and audit activities.
	Perform any other related duties assigned by management relevant to asset and financial management.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: admin@rosettee-construction.net using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
